autoClose.name: Auto Close
autoClose.hint: Automatically close the emoji picker after selecting an emoji

preload.name: Preload
preload.hint: Preload the emoji database on startup, this will load roughly 500kb of data, if this option is disabled the database will be loaded on first use.

emojify.noTokenSelected: No tokens selected, please select at least one token to emojify.
